Module schiffeversenken
Package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.uicomponents

Interface TextInput

All Known Implementing Classes:
MaskedTextBox, Textbox
public interface TextInput
Use this class to mark your component as capable of accepting text.
Author:
leondietrich

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getCurrentTextBuffer()
    As most text inputs consist of an internal buffer this method should contain its state.
    boolean
    getOwnActiveState()
    This method should represent the components own activation state.
    void
    notifyActivationStateChanged(boolean newState)
    This method gets called by a ComponentController when the corresponding component gets activated.
    void
    registerKeyInput(int key, boolean down, boolean up, boolean left, boolean right)
    This method gets called by a ComponentController when there is new Text to be stored.

  • Method Details

    • notifyActivationStateChanged

      void notifyActivationStateChanged(boolean newState)
      This method gets called by a ComponentController when the corresponding component gets activated.
      Parameters:
      newState - The new activation state.

    • getOwnActiveState

      boolean getOwnActiveState()
      This method should represent the components own activation state. It will be used by a ComponentView
      Returns:
      The internal state.

    • registerKeyInput

      void registerKeyInput(int key, boolean down, boolean up, boolean left, boolean right)
      This method gets called by a ComponentController when there is new Text to be stored.
      Parameters:
      key - The key that was pressed.
      down - Was the down arrow key pressed?
      up - Was the up arrow key pressed?
      left - Was the left arrow key pressed?
      right - Was the right arrow key pressed?

    • getCurrentTextBuffer

      String getCurrentTextBuffer()
      As most text inputs consist of an internal buffer this method should contain its state. A calling method must assume that it may return null if it isn't appropriate.
      Returns:
      The current buffer content as a String or null.
